name: image-recommendation-wasm
description: Image recommendation system using WebAssembly and ResNet

scripts.build: emcc Image_Selector_by_CLick_with_merged_image_similarity.cpp -o public/app.js -s WASM=1 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='["_main", "_initProcessor", "_calculateSimilarity", "_processImage", "_getImageStats"]' -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall", "cwrap"]' -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s USE_WEBGL2=1 -s FULL_ES3=1 -s BINDING=1
